mapper.select: SELECT p.pub_id, p.user_id, p.dept_id, p.title, p.authors, p.journal, p.year, p.abstract, p.url, p.word_file_name, p.created_at, p.status, p.reject_reason, u.user_name as user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM publication p LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON p.dept_id = d.dept_id ORDER BY p.pub_id DESC

SELECT p.pub_id, p.user_id, p.dept_id, p.title, p.authors, p.journal, p.year, p.abstract, p.url, p.word_file_name, p.created_at, p.status, p.reject_reason, u.user_name as user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM publication p LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON p.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE p.pub_id = #{id}

SELECT p.pub_id, p.user_id, p.dept_id, p.title, p.authors, p.journal, p.year, p.status, p.reject_reason, u.user_name as user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM publication p LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON p.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE p.status = #{status} ORDER BY p.pub_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO publication ( user_id, dept_id, title, authors, journal, year, abstract, url, word_file_name, status, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{deptId}, #{title}, #{authors}, #{journal}, #{year}, #{abstract_}, #{url}, #{wordFileName}, #{status}, GETDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE publication SET user_id = #{userId}, dept_id = #{deptId}, title = #{title}, authors = #{authors}, journal = #{journal}, year = #{year}, abstract = #{abstract_}, url = #{url}, word_file_name = #{wordFileName}, status = #{status}, reject_reason = #{rejectReason} WHERE pub_id = #{pubId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT authors FROM publication WHERE authors IS NOT NULL ORDER BY authors
